thread.title: SAADEH/ELIAS N
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 6000+ reviewed by SAADEH/ELIAS N

author: SAADEH/ELIAS N
title: SAADEH/ELIAS N
text:
Greg worked relentlessly for me. Never gave up. Found best fair and availability. You can tell he is a good worker. Liked that.
Not directly/ indirectly his fault, but did not like the limited seats that are available for best pricing especially me when I am coming back before anyone else. I liked Greg 's personality. Very nice and likeable.
Also i was hesitant about your company since I didn't deal with you before. However, Greg sent me literature about ASAP.
Thank you. I hope all goes well with our trip.
